name: ai_resume
description: This project is a web-based resume builder that utilizes the OpenAI API for generating resumes. It is built using Next.js, Node.js, and Express.js. This application allows users to create and generate resumes quickly and easily.

scripts.dev: npm start --prefix server && npm run dev --prefix client
scripts.install: npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server

author: Donald Abua <abuadonald@gmail.com>
